name: autoShut
short_description:
autoShut is a java-based cross-platform utility for Windows and Linux for automatic system shutdown.
Provides the ability to the user to either choose the exact time or specify an amount of minutes for system shutdown.

Requirements
-------------------
autoShut requires Java Runtime Environment 7 or greater (JRE 1.7) to be installed on your system. To download the latest Java Runtime Environment, please go to: http://java.com/en/download/index.jsp

********
Linux users please see wiki for post-installation configuration.
https://sourceforge.net/p/jautoshut/wiki/Installing%20on%20Linux%20environment/
********
